name: Project Rocket: Invasion Resurgence
description:
Project Rocket is a Hack & Slash game set in a futuristic universe.
Play as a member of an elite unit of space soldiers, equipped with the latest in human technology, and take on the alien hordes invading the colonies.

It's up to you to repel the Zorg invasion and protect the colonists, using a variety of weapons and skills.
The total destruction of humanity is just around the corner, and its survival is in your hands... Your decisions will be crucial...

Activate the various generators in your Unit's reactor core to enable you to outmaneuver the Zorgs.

A worldwide ranking awaits you. Will you make it into the top 100?
